comments.body: The state parameters for the vmware_guest_powerstate module seem to be inconsistent with those of the vmware_guest module; namely, options like shutdownguest have a hyphen in them, where vmware_guest doesn't.  Is there a reason for the inconsistency?

We preferred this over a single word. That said, I think we should allow the same for vmware_guest (and only document the hyphened options for the future). I don't mind accepting the unhyphened ones in this module.
